website_summaries.verdict: Beats has taken a good wireless noise-canceling headphone and significantly increased its performance.
pros: The Beats Studio3 Wireless offers improved sound quality, noise canceling and battery life from its predecessor in the same sturdy design
Apple's W1 chip makes pairing with Apple devices dead simple
Performs well as a headset for making phone calls and and stacks up well against competing models from a sound standpoint
cons: Design is the same as previous model's
Does not fold flat and carrying case is somewhat bulky

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished?
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were staticky and still had the previous owners info when connected. Apparently these were not tested before being sold!
customer_reviews.author: shamieka Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 8 months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Before writing this review I took the time to contact the company in hopes they would do the right thing, and to their credit they responded quickly, that’s where the good news ends. I spent $217.00 on what is advertised as refurbished and essentially “as new” condition pair of head phones. These were purchased in June 2018 and stopped working February 2019. The warranty is 90 days, so by no means are they obligated to replace them, however I don’t think anyone would be satisfied with $217 for 8 months of use. I cannot in good faith recommend re-com or any of their offerings. Spend the extra money and get new ones, and avoid Re-Com.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THESE DO NOT WORK. I started charging the beats as soon as I got them and when I went to touch them after about an hour of slowly charging they were so hot they burnt my finger. They were almost fully charged so I unplugged them and let them cool. I tried to connect them to my phone through bluetooth per the instruction manual but the little lights wouldn't even show up. I then tried to use the cord to listen to them and no music came throught the headphones. My phone works with every other headphones. EXTREMELY dissappointed, especially with my burnt fingertip!
customer_reviews.author: richiefishie

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a year with little wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones less than a year ago. I have taken great care of these and use them primarily while working or walking. Overall, the quality of sound has been great. However, just now, as I sit on a bench in the park listening to music the headphone falls off my head. The right earphone has a plastic piece that connects it to assembly that goes over your head...it has completely broken off into pieces. I can’t believe this. I could probably tape it together but it would be totally embarrassing. Has this happened to anyone else?
customer_reviews.author: ASB

customer_reviews.title: Brand new
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black and grey pair renewed for my girlfriend and I. If no one told me they were renewed I would have had no idea.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pitlock

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: It’s just perfect. It does isolate all the exterior sound. I was afraid how it would be since it’s refurbished, but I didn’t have any problems. Great quality. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like new!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical purchasing these, being that they were refurbished and also based off some of the reviews on here, but honestly these are seriously great so far. I haven’t had any issues with these and I would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to save a bit of money. These are seriously like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these headphones about a month and a half ago. They came with a crack on one of the headphones ear piece, and they totally stopped working after a short time. I sent them back, and then received a email from Re-Com via Amazon. They indicated that the headphones were not theirs because the serial number didn’t exist in their system, that was a total lie! They also wrote that they received them with a crack in the ear piece, yeah that was there when received! They refused to refund my money. Since they were Prime, Amazon did step in and take care of this issue. Just be cautious when purchasing anything through this 3rd party Re-Com.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita L.

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: bought the studios and was sent the solos and to make matters worst only one side of the headphones actually works.
customer_reviews.author: kyle style

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by seller!
customer_reviews.text: I already had one but it broke on the sides. I decided to buy one that was AMAZON RENEWED and took that chance. It did not disappoint! It had everything like new one would meaning; case, cables and its original box. It also had no scratches. It functions like it should as well. I was impressed by this seller:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Came in horrible audio condition makes loud sound randomly. Also you can’t turn them up all the way or it sound like the speakers are going to blow up. I don’t have time to return them so I’m just going to have to take the loss!
customer_reviews.author: Chaseseymour

customer_reviews.title: Beats have no match
customer_reviews.text: First off id like to mention this was refurbished and sent from amazon wearhouse. Now that out the way, my husband bought some from best buy. My son loves them. My son bought a pair of cheaper pair some off brand thing and he sent it back. Fonally he bought this pair. Same exact model as my husbands but 100 cheaper because it was refurbished. They are exactly the same. Sound the same. There is no substitue. We are a "sound" family and we have some high end sustems in our house. 2 theater rooms. Both in atmos. And these beata make all of us happy.
customer_reviews.author: mimihornsby

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life with decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Noise isolation and sound leave a lot to be desired. The sound is very bass heavy which I expected from beats but the mids were muddy and lyrics very drowned out. Noise cancelation still lets in a lot of ambient noise and creates a lot of cabin pressure compared to Bose. However that 40 hour battery it understated I chocked average 50 almost and I Have headphone on 24/7
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good around the House, HORRIBLE at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to watch Apple TV when my wife is asleep. For this prupose these headphones are pretty good. I used them at the gym today for one workout. It's been 6 hours and the ear padding is still covered with sweat! I don't know of any way to dry or change them out. Before too long these will be smelling pretty gnarly. I want to return them, but they want me to pay shipping and they will not refund the warranty I purchased with these. Beats Studio's are simply BS!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shmoe

customer_reviews.title: Hard Pass on these
customer_reviews.text: I would pass on purchasing this item. Bought these for a trip to Thailand and used only a few times until before I left. Found that they cut in and out often and the noise canceling was not effective. Have owned multiple pairs of headphones and these are not up to the standard of the the pricing. Asked for a replacement but just over 90 days so no help was offered and was told to take them to apple for service. Not happy and stuck with potentially knockoff headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition box and all
customer_reviews.text: They are literally brand new I can’t tell they were ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph gomez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality can’t tell it was refurbished. Like new worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mandeep

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a good product, in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Getting a renewed item can be a bit of a gamble, but this one certainly paid off. Came in an original case with both cables, and a brand case. Battery life is a little bit less than advertised, but still more than enough to last through some heavy daily use. The noise cancellation is very good, though it can fade in/out depending on what I’m doing. Sound quality is less sharp than what I expected, but I believe that’s a side effect of the noise cancellation. All in all, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L

customer_reviews.title: Not worth get some Sony Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Their not all that great off a pair of headphones can find much better fro the same price provided from Sony. You’ Find much better sound on a pair of Sony wireless headphones may not be as ridiculously loud but better bass control and larger range of sound. Maybe it’s just my large ears but after about 30 minutes of use my ears start hurting so the cushion isn’t even comfortable. But can’t say I expected much else from overpriced beats
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself
customer_reviews.text: They’re Beats. Studio quality sound. I was skeptical before I tried Turning the NFC function on then off and it’s very obvious that they work. I travel a bit and these are great on long flight. My only issue is that the audio cable doesn’t power up the device when you plug it into the phone. But hey they’re bluetooth. But it would be nice to know that was capable like in the beats 2.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. In tact & pretty much new! 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Well for starters.... I was very skeptical on ordering these headphones due to the fact that they are “Renewed”. I gave it a chance and this was the result. The case was not included, but the cables were... in the description it says “Carry case included” and “microUSB & remote talk audio cable NOT INCLUDED “... I guess it depends on the third party it is coming from... They are in tact & practically new. I didn’t have any discrepancies on them nor any issues to report. Pretty recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly was a little apprehensive purchasing the refurbished beats BUT to my surprise they are fantastic. Didn’t appear to be used at all they are in great condition and the sound is top notch. My other pair , bought brand new years ago, finally gave out. THANK YOU so very much for providing such incredible quality! Will be recommending this seller! 5 ⭐️‘S !
customer_reviews.author: Nsm1122

customer_reviews.title: Works good but it came without a charger
customer_reviews.text: It’s came without a charger. Really disappointed about that. But overall they are good, noice cancellation is good, if sound is off the rest of the noice sounds like you are in a plane at really high altitude. Bluetooth range and microphone is working good. Battery so far so good. But I really need a charger
customer_reviews.author: Valeria C.

customer_reviews.title: Return if you don’t like them
customer_reviews.text: It was bad they gave me beats with destroyed ear cups they made the super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: jeff m.

customer_reviews.title: If you like bass you're in the right placce.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of wireless headphones and earbuds. These are a solid mid-tier choice and higher if Rap is you musical choice. I bought them refurbished and at a big discount. They look good and feel good on your head. They're a fine serviceable choice. They are noise canceling but the fit and the ear pads they close out most noise.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for refurbished
customer_reviews.text: These look awesome! I was excited to get them finally arrived in the mail. The sound quality wasn’t what I expected and I think it is a personally preference. I thought they would sound better but the bass quality is just decent. Maybe it is because mine are refurbished? No scratches and they look brand new! Battery life has been amazing. Noise cancellation is great! Even when I’m not playing music I can barely hear anything outside of the headphones. I would recommend these to others
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Gaines

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old save up for these and absolutely loves them. Claims to be the best purchase he's ever made, and finally understands what good sound is compared to just a phone speaker. If I didn't already own headphones, I'd consider a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have really loved these headphones! They are wonderful quality and very stylish! The only things that I have noticed about these headphones are that the sound cancellation may not be the best compared to other headphones, but they are still quality. When wind hits the headphones you can hear it pretty clearly. Other than that these headphones are great! May be a bit pricey if you buy if brand new from the apple store, but refurbished is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Honestly 0 problems for the price this is nouthing but a steal
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Micro-USB is a dealbreaker - not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Beware! This uses micro usb, a standard that is well on its way out. Plus uses the older W1 chip instead of the H1, so switching devices is not automagic. Spend a little more if need be and get the Beats Solo Pro. The sound quality is fine, it’s comfortable, but it doesn’t justify the price tag given the lack of lightning/USB-C.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Amezquita

customer_reviews.title: Received broken
customer_reviews.text: The product, I received was broken on the right side. I thought the refurbish product have been inspected.
customer_reviews.author: seng nanthavong

customer_reviews.title: 1st phones I had to turn down💎😆💎
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t take these to the studio, but these are the best version apple or cherry has put out. They have rubber lines air cushions keep the sound in. I would leave the EQ on your iPhone or device on flat Inlet that 808 shake. He’s are the first headphones I actually had to turn down.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: No case
customer_reviews.text: This was my second of renew Beats headphones. They did not come with a case. If they came with the case I would’ve given it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Sarinana

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product has constant ticking on R side.
customer_reviews.text: When the volume is all the way low, I can hear a ticking sound on the right side that is annoying as I'm looking for another video or movie to play. Otherwise, when hearing something I can't hear the ticking as the sound of what I'm listening to or watching silences the ticking or at least overpowers it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I was soooo skeptical after reading some of these reviews. I must say, i am extremely pleased with my purchase. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like brand new
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packed in the original box, with the original hard shell cover. Only thing it did not have was the USB charging chord, bit I have 100 of those laying around as most people do. Excellent product, Excellent Buying Experience and Super Fast Delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Spock

customer_reviews.title: Comes in case not full box
customer_reviews.text: Came in just the case was expecting the whole box but all in all perfect
customer_reviews.author: Milan

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is superb. The noise cancellation is top notch. The sound is awesome. Plus they charge super quickly when you need them in a pinch. As a programmer, I wear them for my everyday walks and constantly at the office. They can get a little warm, but the material has never been damaged and is of good quality. I know some people may be a little scared away because they are used, but they seem like brand new out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: James rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort plus looks.
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn headphones before so i cannot compare to anything else but these headphones are comfortable and deliver good voice quality as well as definite noise deadening. Used them on several flights recently and didnt hear anything going on in the plane. In fact, i was surprised when i took them off as to how much noise was in the cabin in general.
customer_reviews.author: Louie auburn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the fact they’re refurbished scare you
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy a product that was refurbished but the headphones works just like new. The sound quality is perfect they have really good bass. They were in mint condition when I got them. I wish they would have come with a headphone cord and a case but other than that I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Holt

customer_reviews.title: Best ND Headphones for long-term use, amazing (and Re-Com is majestic)
customer_reviews.text: They are every bit as good as you've heard. Comfy (I sleep with mine on), the noise cancellation is genius (adaptive), sound quality is great and the folks at Re-Com interviewed with the USPS to get them delivered (as I was having no luck at all with USPS). I would definitely buy from Re-Com again and recommend both them and Beats Studio3.
customer_reviews.author: KMLSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the refurbished headphones
customer_reviews.text: I received a basically new studio3 headphones. The noise canceling is much improved over the old beats studio2. The sound seems to be cleaner. I have not listened long enough to know about battery life but every thing points to it being much longer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goeckner

customer_reviews.title: It’s basically new Beats headphones for sale.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones had no issues or anything. I opened the box and they smelled brand new and everything looked really clean. The sound quality isn’t the BEST but it’s really close if only it had more bass. Battery life is outstanding, I was surprised how (long these last 28hr weekly = 4hr a day) and how (FAST they charge 30-60mins). I heard bad reviews about these which made me cautious but now that I’ve been using them for a while I’ve loved every second with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase! May have been renewed but packaged as new. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what teenage son requested for birthday and at price point I liked. I'd been concerned about buying "renewed," but he's pretty astute and didn't even realize it was. Packaging looked same as brand new. Hope these last as long as "new."
customer_reviews.author: Suz of NC

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper is not always better
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get them to work properly Somtimes I can answer the phone and sometimes I don't even get the option, they are refurbished so maybe that's the reason. I will be sending them back just not sure if I want to try a new pair in place of refurbished or not
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Had to renew the renewed.
customer_reviews.text: I love beats, but vendor quality is poor. Broke after day 3. Blue tooth wouldn’t bind and I had to reinstall the software, which was way behind current and replace an ear pad. Still cheaper than buying new, but I shouldn’t have to redo the refurb work.
customer_reviews.author: AANW

customer_reviews.title: I AM BEYOND HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't tell they're refurbished. Came in original packaging with all papers. So. Freakin. Comfy! ...Like a tempurpedic for my ears. I have gauges in my ears and wanted something that wouldn't give me a headache while working out. This is it. I recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: My favorite headphones
customer_reviews.text: Came in the original box like brand new. I got the shadow grey and I love the aesthetics. I have used it everyday since and I love them so much! Work gets pretty loud at times and these are perfect noise cancelling. I can wear these all day and it wouldn't put pressure on my ears like alot of other headphones. Would definitely recommend buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: In Great Shape!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ordering something from Amazon Renew, and it was an amazing purchase! The sound quality is amazing, as well as noise cancellation. I received my package, all brand new, everything intact. The headphones had a stain or two but it smelt like new. I was a bit hesitate upon receiving it, knowing how much of a larger purchase this was, but Amazon was kind enough to take a picture of the item arriving at my doorstep which is always a plus! Overall a great purchase, I saved I would say $100+ and would definitely recommend purchasing this. :)
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Condition!
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous about getting a "renewed" item, but was impressed at how new it looked. "Renewed" is a great word to describe it. Noise cancelation is good and sound is clear and full. My only issue is sound. These sound great but mainly at higher volumes. Overall, a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Work like new. No complaints. Love this company. Thank you guys!
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Not working :( ..different color
customer_reviews.text: Bought Studio3 (Grey Renewed) and are not working! Headphones are not charging: no flashing lights on the Fuel Gauge indicator... A light gray (like silver) came instead of dark matte gray :/ ..awaiting for help from the seller. Really bad on this one
customer_reviews.author: Christian Rabay

customer_reviews.title: Like Brand New!
customer_reviews.text: If you would have told me these were a brand new set of headphones you could have fooled me! Got myself a blue pair and they came completely flawless. A big relief after having bought a fake pair off ebay for 150$.. Never doing that again. The quality difference is immediately noticeable! My favorite feature is the fast charge it, this pair came on low battery charged it up and before I knew it back to full! Noise canceling feels a little weird on the ears but I have yet to test them out in a super noisy area. Easy pairing at the click of a button (iphone). Comfortable on the head. All for a little more than 200$? 11/10
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried to buy these refurbished, but the product I received was in great condition. I got the red headphones, and even though the description didn't show a case, it still came with one as well as with all the cords needed. The case was a little banged up (not bad though), and the headphones looked almost new and don't smell weird or anything. Have been using them for about a month, and they work just as well as the previous pair that I had bought new from beats.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Powell

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Charged once, then never would take a charge again. Worked for 3 days. As usual, Amazon is dancing around the replacement, says they can't replace them because the company they bought them from isn't responding.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roper

customer_reviews.title: Just pay the money for new ones.
customer_reviews.text: Missing the case and aux cable and cable with mic in it. All it had was a generic power cable . They were clearly used which I knew but these were scratched and not worth the little discount offered. Better off paying full price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob & Jess

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is insane!
customer_reviews.text: Everything has been amazing, and I bought these back in July. It's now September and they literally work the exact same as they did when I bought them, including battery life. The battery life on these is nuts. Ive used this pair all day before and it didnt even go below like 50. Amazing headphones, really happy with them. The sound quality is also really perfect too, and combined with the noise cancellation, they're the perfect workout and bicycle trip headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Beats
customer_reviews.text: I felt it looked somewhat used/worn. The noise cancellation is excellent. The sound is good! Cable included. No instructions or case but hubby loves them
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using these when I work out and am traveling. Noise cancellation works very well. Caveat: these are my first set. The battery life is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Jarret Sharp

customer_reviews.title: worst buy EVER, absolute junk, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: 4 months into wear and the plastic over the head snapped. After 2 months of wear all the tiny screws had fallen out of the headphones and had to be replaced. I am absolutely dumbfounded that these headphones can cost so much and be of such poor quality. I will never by this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect new Item
customer_reviews.text: Item seemed new because the original plastic seemed to be still on it. Definitely This was the best company to get Items from plus they contacted me to make sure item was meeting my expectations. I love these Beats 3 head phones, and they were 149 dollars cheaper than buying them from apple! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Obbie Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good quality headphones except the batteries don’t really last as long as other beats do but it still good. The batteries still last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Yepo

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The product was labeled “like new” arrived with a few knicks and dings or scuffs. But a plus, the description said it wouldnt come with the proper cables and it did so I suppose im not terribly disappointed. While quality assurance was none existent where the headphones are involved. Im appreciative that i dont have to buy replacement cables. Will update with battery review later.
customer_reviews.author: Cederian T George

customer_reviews.title: Its good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The used version I received was amazing. Just like the original. Everything intact and worked wonderful!!!! I would buy another used one in the future again .
customer_reviews.author: Andy M Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great as expected!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are everything you would expect them to be. Great sound and good noise cancellation! Well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Beats
customer_reviews.text: Great product I would advise anyone to get a pair for the gym or when you just wanna listen to music. Talking on the phone they work pretty good also.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It came in the pill case with a micro usb cord. Looked brand new and works great. It had someone’s name when I paired it for the first time to my phone. That was easily changed. Enjoying my beats.
customer_reviews.author: gtk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent the headphones look and smell like a brand new.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent the headphones look and smell like a brand new. We received in the original box with all the stuff. My wife was worry about because is a refurbished but when she saw the headphones she love it. Now will see how work. The only thing was we received a shadow gray with porcelain rose and don't midnight black with brown or coffee color like the photo reference. The shipment was quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Bought refurbished an there as like brand new
customer_reviews.text: They are just like brand new. Delivery was earlier then expected. Noise canceling is 100% the best. Bought these for my boyfriend that works outside an he has no issues great sound an battery life
customer_reviews.author: Gina Toto

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, basically new
customer_reviews.text: Basically brand new, the only thing that gave away they were refurbished was because they were named “Ryan’s Beats” when trying to connect them to my other devices. They came in the box and all the cords included were unused. I have the same new beats from Apple and got these as a gift for my mom who loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Leah P

customer_reviews.title: dont do it
customer_reviews.text: These headphones came scratched up, stains, crumbs, paint peeling and leather flaking. Would disconnect from my iPhone at any given moment. The four indicator lights never worked so you don’t know if it’s charging if it’s on or battery life. The right side speaker blew out so now it’s just static and no noise cancellation. You also have to pay to return and they won’t send you a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones 🎧 so far
customer_reviews.text: If Love Bass like I do, You won’t find better Headphones, They actually vibrate a little at high volume like your at a club..Great Sound Quality over all..Honesty can’t tell they are refurbished..Amazon guarantee for 90 days just hope nothing goes wrong before then but so far a happy camper😉
customer_reviews.author: Clayborne Cauley

customer_reviews.title: Renewed means 'not as good'
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these headphones, but I ended up returning them right away. They do not get loud at all, the sound is awful, and the bass is non-existent. Do not spend your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Selius

customer_reviews.title: Only played out of one headphone — sound quality was extremely poor
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I tried it it only played out of one side of the headphones, and the sound quality was extremely poor and the volume was really low (even when I turned it up). It was surprising to me that this product passed quality control. I was extremely disappointed and I will definitely think twice about buying refurbished next time.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wanting these for forever. I finally got it for him and he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: tluvjx3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones arrived in perfect condition and have been working great!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great buy...
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones. The noise cancellation works well, even on flights. I use it a lot with the built in mic via Bluetooth to talk on the phone so that a big plus. I opted for the refurbished and they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, bought for my son and I kept them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, I stole them and use them more than he does! Comfortable, really blocks out my screaming kids! What more could you want, long lasting battery, noise canceling, comfortable, and stylish! 10 out of 10 would definitely buy again, wish I had done it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tetanich

customer_reviews.title: These were not renewed
customer_reviews.text: My headphones came with everything promised! BUT, they smelled like someone wore them every day to workout. A repulsive smell. Can't leave them on for more than a minute. I need to return them the day after I got them...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Renewed is not refurbished
customer_reviews.text: These still had sealing sticker on them. This review refers to The Beats sound quality. The noise cancelation would have received 5 stars if beats actually noises canceled completely but asa rating for the product from the seller, ANC was at perfect standard operation. Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Happy,happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I like absolutely everything packing, excellent condition.... beautiful absolutely freaking beautiful I love it... I'll be coming at you soon my wife seen it now she wants some too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great over ear headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Great sound. Good for lifting weights. Not secure enough for running but they are very comfortable and have good controls.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Novotny

customer_reviews.title: Great PRICE! And Like NEW! Condition.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was kind of worried about ordering the “renewed” headphones, but with the 90 day guarantee backing it I figured may as well try it out. And I am glad I did the battery life is amazing and the condition and packaging the headphones are and were in is outstanding. I recommend buying a renewed product mostly because any manufacturer issues that may be happening are probably fixed.
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the beats trust me but sometimes the sound quality gets a little scratchy. Another thing i would like to add is that when your on the bus and noise cancellation is on, the noise cancellation sound shaky and sorta cheap idk🤦🏾‍♂️🤷🏾‍♂️ but overall very good and decent headphones. Hated the price tho😤😒
customer_reviews.author: Saalif

customer_reviews.title: They're decent no noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: They're decent headphones but everyone can hear what I'm listening to plus I didn't get my carrying case that was supposed to come with it
customer_reviews.author: Malik kyser

customer_reviews.title: Headband will break
customer_reviews.text: Headphone sound quality is great. The low rating is for the quality of the headband. It broke a few months after they were purchased. I had to buy a replacement part which was conveniently available as a kit for $20 on Amazon. Beats has a design issue they need to fix. Good for the guys capitalizing on the design flaw with replacement part kits.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to use while running they work perfectly. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: good headphones
customer_reviews.text: works great, bought them for my gf. long battery life and came in prestine condition even as an Amazon Renewed item.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancelation
customer_reviews.text: Present for my son. They are a step up from what he had and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: joey s.

customer_reviews.title: has alot of wear sogns
customer_reviews.text: has alot of eear signs. i wish i would've bought a new one.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The Beats that beat all challengers!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these Beats to my daughter. She loves them and that says it all.
customer_reviews.author: LES KREW

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these refurbished headphones and still having technical problems. The batter dies extremely fast & the auxiliary cord doesn’t even work, useless & very disappointed to pay almost 200 dollars fora refurbished product that still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to experience the quality of these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Fredy A Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far enjoying great music. Best deal ever renewed buy.
customer_reviews.author: David and Jeanine Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I got them for my teenage son for Christmas. Setup was easy. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price, my son loves them and he’s been using them for months with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Soraida Poventud

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, lame charger
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I am admittedly a novice when it comes to studio headphones, but these sound great. The noise cancellation is top notch. What I was not happy about is the charger was broken when I received it. It seems kind of flimsy. I had to buy another one. Overall though, I am impressed and happy
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lord

customer_reviews.title: Best BEATS ever!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, do not spend money buying any other brand! BUY BEATS STUDIO 3 YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT. (now I just nod my head and pretend I am listening to my girlfriend, I love it!)
customer_reviews.author: Ivaan Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: RENEWED IS THE WAY TO GO!
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly amazing condition for them being Renewed. I will 100% lean toward renewed products in the future. The sound quality is awesome and they fit very comfortably on my head. I was hoping for a mic input but either way, these headphones are awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: They are a little big. Not very snug but the sound is good and they work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Beats Studio3 Wireless Headphones - Red (Renewed)
feature_bullets: Renewed products look and work like new. These pre-owned products have been inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers, which typically perform a full diagnostic test, replacement of any defective parts, and a thorough cleaning process. Packaging and accessories may be generic. All products on Amazon Renewed come with a minimum 90-day supplier-backed warranty.
Features the iconic Beats sound with Dual-Mode Adaptive Noise Canceling, plus the added benefit of wireless listening.
Pair and Play with your Bluetooth device with 30ft range.
